item.description: North Shore Dog is a lovely warm place for doggies to enjoy seeing old friends and meet new ones. The room is large enough for long-distance ball throwing, and there's also some doggie-type play equipment for those inclined to explore it; and there are chairs enough for the humans to sit on, too. We've met up here often in winters past, but it's seems a long time since last time, so let's go!

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: Run around and play indoors at North Shore Dog!
